name: 陸元平
objective:
本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的選修課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由課堂講授與實際場域參訪，使修課學生能夠瞭解現今整個鐵道資通訊系統與行控中心的架構、配置、功能及目標。
在後電氣化時代，資通訊技術（Information and Communication Technology, ICT）的發展與創新應用，將定義了整個鐵道產業的未來。由於鐵道資通訊系統本身屬於跨管理、資訊與通訊等專業領域的技術，因此，本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式，針對選讀學程之學生，邀請鐵道資通訊技術應用專家，以業師的身份共同參與授課。
本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時，針對管理、資訊、通訊三部分提出通訊系統與行控中心規劃與評估報告，並邀請學者與產業專家擔任評審。
This course is the elective subject of Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The main purpose of this course is to provide the students an overall understanding of the structure, configuration, function, and the objective of the domestic railway industry and operation control center (OCC). The course will be organized with practical technology lecturing and on-site field visiting.
In the post-electrification era, development and innovative application of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) will dictate the future of railway industry. ICT of railway industry is interdisciplinary which involves management, information, communication, etc. This intercollegiate course will invite industrial instructors, i.e. ICT experts from some relevant fields in intelligent railway industry, to our course.
In the final project, students are required to plan and assess the communication system and OCC focused on management, information, and communication. The final report will be evaluated by expe
schedule:
課程單元主題：
W01: 課程介紹
W02: 資通訊技術（ICT）概論
W03-W04: 現代數位通訊系統
W05-W06: 電話、無線電、廣播系統、標準時鐘、不斷電系統、閉路電視（CCTV）、網路
W07-W08: 車載通訊系統
W09: 期中考週
W10-W11: 中繼通訊系統
W12-W13: 現代資訊系統
W14: 列車控制與監視系統（TCMS）
W15: 智慧型即時視訊監控（CCTV）系統
W16: 旅客資訊系統（PIS）
W17: 自動收費系統
W18: 期末考週
scorePolicy: 課堂參與、期中報告、期末報告
